00020    Psc_config_input_1(PSC_OVERLAP_ENABLE,\
00021                       PSC_USE_COMPARATOR,\
00022                       PSC_USE_HIGH_LEVEL,\
00023                       PSC_INPUT_FILTER_ENABLE,\
00024                       PSC_SYNCHRONOUS_OUTPUT_CONTROL,\
00025                       PSC_INPUT_NO_ACTION);

00029                       PSC_USE_COMPARATOR,\
00030                       PSC_USE_HIGH_LEVEL,\
00031                       PSC_INPUT_FILTER_ENABLE,\
00032                       PSC_SYNCHRONOUS_OUTPUT_CONTROL,\

00039 //  #define HALL_B() (ANA_COMP1_vect)
00040   #define HALL_B() (PCINT1_vect)
00041   #define HALL_C() (ANA_COMP2_vect)

00043 
00044   #define HALL_SENSOR_VALUE()        \
00045     (Hall_Position)(\
00046     ( (PIND & (1<<PIND7)) >> PIND7 ) \
00047   | ( (PINC & (1<<PINC6)) >> 5 )     \
00048   | ( (PIND & (1<<PIND5)) >> 3 ))
00049 
00050   #define Clear_Port_Q5() (PORTB &= ( ~(1<<PORTB0)))
00051   #define Clear_Port_Q3() (PORTC &= ( ~(1<<PORTC0)))
00052   #define Clear_Port_Q1() (PORTD &= ( ~(1<<PORTD0)))
00053   #define Clear_Port_Q6() (PORTB &= ( ~(1<<PORTB1)))
00054   #define Clear_Port_Q4() (PORTB &= ( ~(1<<PORTB6)))
00055   #define Clear_Port_Q2() (PORTB &= ( ~(1<<PORTB7)))
00056   #define Set_Port_Q2()   (PORTB |=   (1<<PORTB1))
00057   #define Set_Port_Q4()   (PORTB |=   (1<<PORTB6))
00058   #define Set_Port_Q6()   (PORTB |=   (1<<PORTB7))
00059 
00060   // Six step commutation
00061   #define Set_none()                \
00062     POC = (0<<POEN0A)|(0<<POEN0B)|\
00063           (0<<POEN1A)|(0<<POEN1B)|\
00064           (0<<POEN2A)|(0<<POEN2B);\
00065     Clear_Port_Q2();                \
00066     Clear_Port_Q4();                \
00067     Clear_Port_Q6();                \
00068     Clear_Port_Q1();                \
00069     Clear_Port_Q3();                \
00070     Clear_Port_Q5();
